DOC.brief_summary: To determine NMDA antagonist , CP-101,606 , effective depression
DOC.brief_title: The Antidepressant Effects Of The NMDA Antagonist , CP-101,606 , In Patients With MDD
DOC.criteria: Primary DSMIV diagnosis MDD Subjects evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) .
